alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 3:19AM EST until February 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Rutland County in Vermont. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST today. * IMPACTS....Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact this morning`s and this evening`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will mainly be rain, with pockets of freezing rain and sleet likely this morning. Precipitation will end as a period of snow during the midday to early afternoon hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
